scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run typecheck && npm run esbuild
scripts.build:watch: rm -rf dist && concurrently -n TSC,ESBUILD -c yellow,cyan "npm run typecheck:watch" "npm run esbuild:watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n ESBUILD,APP -c yellow,cyan "npm run esbuild:watch" "wait-on dist/index.js && nodemon --enable-source-maps dist/index.js"
